description: A yummy and quick way to use up a few left over veg & a healthy breakkie (or lunch or dinner)
name: Leftovers Corn Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up pie maker, or frying pan. If you have a pie maker, once hot, add 2 spoon full of batter to each pie hole. Close lid and let cook for 5-10mins or until top starts to set a little. Flip the fritters and cook for another 5 mins. Remove from pie maker and continue until all batter cooked. If using a frying pan, heat a good amount of either olive, canola or vegetable oil. Shallow fry 1-2 spoonfuls of batter per fritter. Flip once it starts to bubble. Watch out, they may stick a little! Once cooked, put on paper towel on plate to drain a little.
